mapper.select: select order_id, cust_id, order_totalAmount, order_date, cus_zipcode, order_add1, order_add2, order_telephone, order_status from order_info where cust_id = #{cust_id} order by order_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into order_info(order_id, cust_id, order_totalAmount, order_date, cus_zipcode, order_add1, order_add2, order_telephone, order_status) values (#{order_id}, #{cust_id}, #{order_totalAmount}, #{order_date}, #{cus_zipcode}, #{order_add1}, #{order_add2}, #{order_telephone}, #{order_status})
